content.en: Covert channel detection: Researchers have been exploring various methods to detect covert channels in network traffic. These covert channels are used to hide information and can pose a threat to cybersecurity. Algorithms, such as packet classification, phase space reconstruction, support vector machines, and machine learning, are being utilized to detect and characterize these covert channels. Additionally, new detection methods based on time series symbolization, image processing, and inter-packet delays' variation are being proposed. These advancements in algorithmic detection aim to improve the security of network systems.
content.da: Detektion af skjulte kanaler: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige metoder til at opdage skjulte kanaler i netværkstrafik. Disse skjulte kanaler bruges til at skjule information og kan udgøre en trussel mod cybersikkerhed. Algoritmer som pakkeklassificering, fase rum rekonstruktion, support vector maskiner og maskinlæring anvendes til at opdage og karakterisere disse skjulte kanaler. Derudover foreslås nye detektionsmetoder baseret på tidsseriers symbolisering, billedbehandling og variation af inter-pakke forsinkelser. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmisk detektion har til formål at forbedre sikkerheden i netværkssystemer.
